item.title: Internal tech talks: How to motivate everyone to share their knowledge
item.description: Going to conferences is great, but when your organization reaches a certain size, there is a huge untapped potential when it comes to doing internal knowledge sharing too. Your organization has skilled programmers, UX experts, test experts ++. And when “nudged” in the correct way, they all have lots to share. I want to talk about how we approach this in our organization. First, you need to create ownership to these sessions.
